text: R package collection functions simplify seed biology related tasks

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
text: Obtain T50 values using Coolbear et al. (1984) formula modified Farooq et al.(2005). Vector containing scoring days must length vector containing cumulative germination data

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
code: coolbear(   day = "vector containing scoring dates",   cumulative = "vector containing cumulative germination for each day",   n = "total number of viable seeds" )

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
text: day vector containing scoring days cumulative vector containing cumulative germination day n Number viable seeds Petri dish (Total sown seeds - empty seeds)

what: Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
title: Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
text: Calculates result relative humidity mixing two lithium chloride solutions

title: Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
text: rh1 relative humidity percentage value solution number one vol1 volume 'Litres' solution rh1 rh2 relative humidity percentage value solution number two vol2 volume 'Litres' solution rh2

title: Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
text: string mixed solution relative humidity percentage

title: Calculates the result relative humidity of mixing two lithium chloride solutions — rh_mix
code: rh_mix(rh1=50,vol1=0.5,rh2=70,vol2=0.25) #> Reminder: Ensure volumes are L. #> [1] "New solution will achieve a relative humidity of 56.56%"

what: Calculate necessary changes to lithium chloride solutions to achieve target relative humidity — rh_modify

title: Calculate necessary changes to lithium chloride solutions to achieve target relative humidity — rh_modify
Calculate necessary changes to lithium chloride solutions to achieve target relative humidity — rh_modify
text: initial_rh relative humidity percentage value solution modified desired_rh percentage value desired relative humidity initial_volume volume 'Litres' initial solution

title: Calculate necessary changes to lithium chloride solutions to achieve target relative humidity — rh_modify
Calculate necessary changes to lithium chloride solutions to achieve target relative humidity — rh_modify
code: rh_modify(initial_rh=20,desired_rh=40,initial_volume=0.5) #> Reminder: Ensure all values are in g. and L. #> [1] "Volume of water to be added to your solution:" #> [1] "0.24 L."
